description: These emojis, on the other hand, have triangle shaped sunglasses. They seem to be going for a slightly unconventional look, as if they want to stand out from the crowd or start a new trend. Maybe they just want to live outside of the box and so square glasses felt too limiting. Who knows, but there sure are a lot of emoticons to choose from in this list.
